title: Leading games on Twitch as of July 2019 , by hours viewed
summary: This is a bar chart representing Video Game in the x axis and Number of hours in millions in the y axis.
The Number of hours in millions is highest at Video Game Fortnite and lowest at Video Game Apex Legends.
The highest Video Game Fortnite has 20.8 more Number of hours in millions than the lowest Video Game Apex Legends.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Video Game, and Number of hours in millions in each Video Game on the y axis.
The maximum Number of hours in millions 24.8 is found at Video Game Fortnite and the minimum is found at Apex Legends where Number of hours in millions is 4.0.
